articles.title: Sophism of War Criminal - KCNA News Analyst's Article -
S. Korean Defense Ministry Manifests Intention to Dispatch More Troops to Iraq
articles.content:
S. Korean Defense Ministry Manifests Intention to Dispatch More Troops to Iraq 
    Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Defense of south Korea on Sept. 16 expressed its intention to dispatch troops to Iraq again, according to south Korean MBC.
 In a report of the Defense Committee of the National Assembly on the same day it announced the schedule to send a "Jaitun" airlifting group to Iraq in mid-October, saying that it had recently formed the group, which was now in training, the radio reported.    
 A series of schemes of the south Korean authorities to dispatch troops at a time when the voices opposing it are rising to a new crescendo are a head-on challenge to the whole Korean nation and the world people who love justice and peace.

Talks between DPRK and Chinese Delegations
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK and Chinese Delegations 
    Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between the delegation of the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK and the delegation of the Ministry of Water Resources of China at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday.
 At the talks the two sides exchanged views on further developing cooperation in the hydrological field between the two countries and a series of matters of common concern.    
 Attending the talks were the members of the delegation of the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK led by its Director Ko Il Hun and the members of the delegation of the Chinese Ministry of Water Resources led by Vice-Minister E Jingping.
